name: Armageddon v2
description:
Hi!

This is our submission for the "My First Game Jam" in the summer of 2020.

Welcome to our game, Armageddon!

In this game, you play a human in a post-apocalyptic world that has been taken over by robots. Your only defense is your stash of guns that you have in your house.

Run, hop, and shoot through levels, some giving you different guns, and reach the flag to be safe for another day!

Six different levels with Six unqiue weapons.

Ps: Theres an Easter Egg

Credits:

Sounds are from OpenGameArt.org
